result.title: Validation report and end use manual for the real-time energy consumption and carbon footprint monitoring for the SMARTechs
result.description:
The report includes: (i) the methodology of the online monitoring tool for the determination of the carbon footprint and the energy efficiency of the seven the SMART plant systems, (ii) the operation manual for end-users: carbon footprint on-line monitoring, (iii) troubleshooting report after 1 year operation: carbon footprint on-line monitoring, (iv) the results from the application and validation of the real-time energy consumption and carbon footprint monitoring model for the mainstream and side stream SMART-Plant processes, (v) comparison of the tool’s results with the respecive ones obtained for conventional processes, (vi) target mitigations measures and suitable options for the erductions GHG emissions in the SMART-Plant systems. The final report on the real time GHGs on-line monitoring system can be used by water utilities.
INTERIM to the COORDINATOR at Month 17 - lead UBRUN
